vendor_name: San Clemente Palace (previously known as San Clemente Palace Kempinski Venice)
title: Discover Five-Star Kempinski Elegance on a Private Island in Venice
description: Indulge at a Luxurious Private Island Retreat off the Coast of Venice! Spend Three Nights/Four Days in an Upgraded Deluxe Room at the Five-Star San Clemente Palace Kempinski. Enjoy Daily Breakfasts, a Three-Course Dinner at La Dolce Restaurant, a  EUR85 ($127) Food and  Beverage Credit, a Bottle of Prosecco, Complimentary Transfers Between the Resort and Venice, and More. Only $1,499 for Two Adults, Valued up to $3,799
location_description: San Clemente Palace Kempinski [179184] Venetian Decadence at the Five-Star San Clemente Palace Kempinski
offer_address: Isola di San Clemente 1, San Marco Venice

title: Five-Star Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Rome
description: Soak up the romance of the Eternal City at the five-star Hotel d’Inghilterra, located just minutes from some of Rome's most iconic sights. Stay for three nights/four days in an upgraded Superior Room with daily breakfasts, a three-course dinner at Café Romano and a welcome drink on arrival for just $999 for two adults, valued up to $3,514
location_description: Hotel D'Inghilterra [183413] Five-Star Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Rome

title: Italian Food & Wine Escape in Perugia
description: Experience the history, food and wine of Italy’s charming Perugia province with seven nights at Valle di Assisi. Includes daily breakfasts, three-course dinners with wine, nightly cocktails or wine, a wine tasting, massages and spa access, cooking class discount and more.
offer_address: Via S. Bernardino Da Siena, 116, 06081 Santa Maria degli Angeli PG, Italy

title: Hotel Antiche Mura: Chic Italian Escape in Sorrento
description: Experience the cosmopolitan coastal vibes of Italy’s chic town of Sorrento with four nights at Hotel Antiche Mura. Includes homemade pastries and welcome drinks on arrival, daily buffet breakfasts, a daily beer, wine or prosecco each and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Italian Elegance in Historic Siena, Tuscany
description: The rich culture and exquisite cuisine of Italy’s Tuscany region awaits. Discover the beauty of historic Siena and more from the Hotel Executive, ideally located for exploring Tuscany, Florence and Italy’s west coast. Enjoy five nights in a standard room with daily breakfasts, indulgent nightly three-course à la carte dinners with wine, a nightly drink each, a complimentary one-way private transfer from the airport to the hotel and more for just $699 for two adults, valued up to $2,177.
location_description: Hotel Executive [188470] Italian Elegance in Historic Siena, Tuscany*
offer_address: Via Nazareno Orlandi, 32, Siena SI, Italy

title: Vittoria Resort and Spa, Puglia: One of the World's Top Destinations
description: Discover Italy’s most exciting culinary destination, Puglia, recently named one of the world's hottest destinations by Vogue Australia. Spend four nights in a Classic Room and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, cocktails, a bottle of local red wine, a three-course dining experience, discounts on spa treatments, pizza at a local pizzeria and more for two adults.
location_description: Vittoria Resort and Spa [213462] Vittoria Resort and Spa 6/09/2017 Escapes*

title: Historic Palazzo Stay in the Heart of Milan, Italy
description: Soak up the rich culture and history of the Italian city of Milan with a historic palazzo stay at Palazzo Segreti, a stylish boutique hotel in the heart of the city. Enjoy a three-night city break staying in an individually-designed Deluxe Room with daily buffet breakfasts, an Italian cheese-tasting experience, a complimentary bottle of local red wine to share and a welcome drink each for just $799 for two adults, valued up to $1,265. title: Discover Rome with the Grand Hotel Ritz Roma
description: Experience the food, wine and history of Italy's cosmopolitan capital staying at the Grand Hotel Ritz Roma. Explore Rome's iconic sites like the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain and Pantheon with a four-night stay including daily breakfasts, a bottle of wine, complimentary shuttle service to the city centre, spa discounts and more for two adults.

title: Old-World Charm in the Heart of Rome
description: Discover the food, wine and culture of Rome staying at the centrally located Hotel Forum Roma - the perfect base for your Italian adventure. Includes daily buffet breakfasts, two bottles of prosecco and more for two adults.
offer_address: Via Tor de' Conti, 25-30, Roma RM

title: Palazzo dei Mercanti - The Historic Heart of Italy
description: Experience the unique charm of Italy, staying at Palazzo dei Mercanti -  a boutique hotel in a historic Italian palace located in the city centre of Ascoli Piceno. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a three-course Italian dinner with drinks, complimentary minibar, welcome drink each and access to the hotel’s spa facilities including a Turkish bath, chromo-therapeutic showers and more for two.
location_description: Palazzo dei Mercanti [213781] Palazzo dei Mercanti 2/08/2017 Escapes
offer_address: Corso Trento e Trieste, 35 Ascoli Piceno

title: Classic Italian Romance in Vicenza, Between Venice and Milan
description: Discover the classic beauty and romance of the town of Vicenza, the perfect place to relax and unwind in the Italian countryside. Located between two of Italy's most famous cities, Venice and Milan, spend seven nights at the 18-century country house of Hotel Villa Michelangelo. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a three-course 'Flavours of Italy' dining experience, two tickets to the Olympic Theatre and more for only $1,099 for two adults, valued up to $3,834.
location_description: Villa Michelangelo Vicenza - Starhotels Collezione [203985] Classic Italian Romance in Vicenza, Between Venice and Milan
offer_address: Via Sacco, 35, 36057 Arcugnano VI, Italie Arcugnano
